txt.en: Listen to the Avanc-lûth during the Assembly
You have stepped inside the Chieftain's Hut
You have saved the Abominations, ending the nigthmare!
The Elders of Lhan Rhos have called Assembly with the members of the Avanc-lûth. Now, you must attend the Assembly and hear what the Avanc-lûth have to say.
You have killed Knotfist, ending the nightmare!

'You have done much for our people and opened our eyes to many things. We will hear from all of the Avanc-lûth as is our custom. \n\n'Sit and listen to our people. They will have much to say about the situation and the knowledge which you have brought before us.'
'Thank you, friend of the Avanc-lûth. You have brought our people to the war that would have consumed us all had we remained unaware.\n\n'We are saved because of you.'
Listen to the Assembly. The people of Avanc-lûth have much to say.
The Assembly is over. Speak to Elder Déin again.
End the nightmare of the Abominations
